title: 143: Joy Through Pain w/ Ruthie Lindsey
itunes:title: 143: Joy Through Pain w/ Ruthie Lindsey
description:
The Broads have the pleasure of talking to the ray of sunshine human that is Ruthie Lindsey. Ruthie talks all about her incredibly difficult and painful journey and how she has reached a place of peace and love for life. She explains how she got there and chats all about her breakdown which she now calls her “break thru”. Her words are not ones you will want to miss, Broads. And make sure to check out her new book, “There I Am”. 
ABOUT RUTHIE LINDSEY:
WEBSITE: http://www.ruthielindsey.com/
PURCHASE RUTHIE’S BOOK “THERE I AM” HERE: https://www.simonandschuster.com/books/There-I-Am/Ruthie-Lindsey/9781982107918
VIRTUAL BOOK TOUR: http://www.ruthielindsey.com/virtual-book-tour
BOOK CLUB: http://www.ruthielindsey.com/bookclub
HER PODCAST: https://theunspokenpodcast.com (https://theunspokenpodcast.com/)
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/ruthielindsey/
THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS: 
*** MAGIC SPOON: Go to http://magicspoon.com/CHATTY to grab a variety pack and try it today! And be sure to use our promo code CHATTY at checkout to ​get free shipping!
 
*** ATHENA CLUB: Sign up today and you’ll get 15% off your first order! Just go to Athena Club dot com and use promo code “CHATTY"
*** DAILY HARVEST: Go to dailyharvest.com (http://dailyharvest.com/) and enter promo code CHATTY to get $25 off your first box!
